statements: SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id > 10;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = FALSE;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id > 100 ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = false AND LENGTH(policy_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%server%' AND is_active = true;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, LENGTH(policy_description) AS description_length FROM security_policies ORDER BY description_length ASC, policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT title, content FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, record_type, status FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT id, role FROM employee_roles WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT owner_id, title FROM policy_documents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, content, owner_id FROM policy_documents WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, record_type, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, department, role FROM employee_roles ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocumentation WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM ComplianceDocumentation WHERE doc_type = 'Report';
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkOperations WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_owner = 'Admin' ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM ComplianceDocumentation WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT operation_name, department FROM RemoteWorkOperations WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY operation_id ASC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND policy_owner <> 'User';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocumentation WHERE doc_type LIKE '%security%' AND doc_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT worker_name, department FROM remote_workers WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, accessed_at FROM access_logs WHERE worker_id = 101 ORDER BY accessed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type, created_at FROM compliance_documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT worker_name, department FROM remote_workers WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT worker_name, action, accessed_at FROM remote_workers JOIN access_logs ON remote_workers.worker_id = access_logs.worker_id ORDER BY accessed_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_status = 'approved';
SELECT operation_name, operation_status FROM remote_work_operations ORDER BY operation_status DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM employee_security_roles WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT log_timestamp, action_type, performed_by FROM audit_logs WHERE performed_by LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Access Control';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, role_name FROM employee_security_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT log_timestamp, action_type, performed_by FROM audit_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
